text: James Alexander Maynard (born 10 June 1987) is a British mathematician. His works focused in analytic number theory. In 2017, he was hired as a Research Professor at Oxford University. He was awarded the Fields Medal in 2022. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 2020. ==References== == Other websites == * Maynard interviewed by Brady Haran on the Twin Prime Conjecture * Maynard interviewed by Brady Haran on the completion of the Duffin-Schaeffer Conjecture * James Maynard publications indexed by Google Scholar Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Fields Medalists Category:Writers from Essex Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:Alumni of the University of Cambridge Category:English mathematicians Category:Members of Academia Europaea
title: James Maynard (mathematician)
